name: FriendlyData, Inc.
description: Developer of a natural language interface designed to integrate human voice and text into queries to simplify sorting through data. The company's interface translates human language into SQL query and then returns data in JSON format, enabling businesses to increase user engagement and employees productivity by providing natural language interface for databases.
one_liner: Developer of a natural language interface designed to integrate human voice and text into queries to simplify sorting through data.
